page.description: If a Grid has a checkbox column, sets the state of the checkbox in all rows of the Grid on the current Grid Page.

argument.name: flag
argument.description: State to select for all rows on the current Grid Page. A value of *[js:true]* will check all rows on the current Grid page. A value of *[js:false]* will uncheck all rows on the current Grid page.

discussion.p: The *[js:_selectAllRowCheckboxes()]* method selects all of the rows on the current grid page. This method is only available if the [Checkbox Column] has been enabled for the Grid Component.

see.ref: How to Export Selected Records to Excel in a Grid Component with a Checkbox Select Column
Working with Checkbox Select Columns in Ajax Callbacks (Xbasic)
